articles.title: Fraunhofer researchers investigate the mechanisms of metastasis formation - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: What makes tumor cells turn murderous? The Fraunhofer Institute for Toxicology and Experimental Medicine ITEM is investigating the mechanisms of metastasis formation - and searching for approaches for new treatments in the fight against cancer.
